text: Hylia may refer to: *Green hylia, a species of songbird and the only species in genus Hylia *Tit hylia, a species of songbird and the only species in genus Pholidornis *Hylia, character in the video game The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword ==See also== *Hylian, race in The Legend of Zelda video game series
title: Hylia
